feed.title: Erdi’s Site
feed.subtitle: This is the site of a Spigot/Bukkit developer with the username Erdi__ on SpigotMC.org The blog present on the site will contain information and updates about Erdi's plugins and freelance availability

entry.title: My Site!
entry.content:
Yup, I have a site now. And you’re (probably) on it right now, welcome!
I will be posting updates on my plugins and other development on this blog! Stay tuned if you’re interested in that :)
entry.summary: Yup, I have a site now. And you’re (probably) on it right now, welcome! I will be posting updates on my plugins and other development on this blog! Stay tuned if you’re interested in that :)
